00028         if (!isset(self::$oInstance)) {
00029             self::$oInstance = new Buffer();

00044     public function set($vName, $sValue = null) {
00045 
00046         // if only $vName is provided as a string, then save as indexed value
00047         if (is_string($vName) && is_null($sValue)) {
00048             $this->aVars[] = $vName;
00049         }
00050 
00051         // if only $vName is provided as array, then save associative array of variables
00052         else if (is_array($vName) && is_null($sValue)) {
00053             foreach ($vName as $sKey => $sValue) {
00054                 $this->set($sKey, (string) $sValue);
00055             }
00056         }
00057 
00058         // a straight-forward name/value pair
00059         else {
00060             $this->aVars[$vName] = (string) $sValue;
00061         }
00062     }
00063 
00070     public function get($sName) {
00071         return isset($this->aVars[$sName]) ? $this->aVars[$sName] : null;
00072     }
